name: Swingcopter Flip
description: Flips the player's visuals upside down when gravity is reversed in swingcopter mode. Makes it easier to keep track of what your gravity is.

mod-enabled.name: Enabled
mod-enabled.description: Whether or not the mod is enabled. Turning this off will remove the flipping.

invert-flip.name: Flip Sprite When Right Side Up
invert-flip.description: Flip the sprite when the player is in REGULAR gravity. Some swingcopter icons face up so it can feel confusing without it.

subtle-rotation.name: Subtle Rotation Animation
subtle-rotation.description: Enable/disable a slight rotation applied to the swing when they flip directions.
